name: Managestuff
0:
”Alexa start manage stuff”
”create a thing”
”add new book the old man and the sea”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: manage stuff
Developer Terms of Use
des: With this skill you can easily populate Managestuff things list with voice. You can either create book, cd, dvd, electronics or other. Next give it a name and voice assistant will automatically add it to you things. One prerequisite to match - you should sign in to managestuff with Google and link your skill with the same google account.
